cuteBot: Functions to Cutebot by ELECFREAKS Co.,Ltd.
cuteBot.Motors: Select the motor on the left or right
cuteBot.RGBLights: Select the RGBLights on the left or right
cuteBot.back: TODO: full speed move back,speed is -100.
cuteBot.forward: TODO: full speed move forward,speed is 100.
cuteBot.getMessage: return the message of the received IR
cuteBot.getRecType: return the encoding type of the received IR
cuteBot.motors: TODO: Set the speed of left and right wheels.
cuteBot.onReceivedIR: Do something when a receive IR
cuteBot.rgblight: Select a lamp and set the RGB color.
cuteBot.tracking: Judging the Current Status of Tracking Module.
cuteBot.tracking|param|state: Four states of tracking module, eg: L_R_line
cuteBot.ultrasonic: Cars can extend the ultrasonic function to prevent collisions and other functions..
